Articles.Content:
Here is my second replica plane, my attempt at a Spitfire!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Obviously it is not perfect, but it is the best I can come up with using stock parts. The nose was tricky and the wings could do with being a bit longer but I feel that I have the basic shape of the plane there. I also clipped in a jet engine in the tail so you can fly it like a normal plane. Flies pretty well.

Craft file.

Feel free to critique, modify, have fun etc.
looks good. i dont think the main wings need to be longer just thinner thats all i saw other than that thumbs up
